attributes.review: I rarely leave bad reviews. attributes.review: This app is the worst app you could get! Had high hopes but instead I was just disappointed.. First off I opened the app and saw something so disgusting and disturbing, this should not be allowed in the Unites States, or actually anywhere. So disappointed and disgusted!! It was lagging so much, and it‚Äôs just a terrible app overall. If I could put negative stars, I would. Do not download.
attributes.title: Terrible!

attributes.review: app was okay at first i suppose, decently programmed. suddenly it started to crash a ton and corrupted phone as a whole. after a few days it started to cause phone to release a foul smell that only became worse with time. the scent was that of a rotting corpse. app also blocked out every other race but white from my phone, pictures and social media were changed and white washed, super weird. would cause phone to ooze a strange and stinky sludge from cracks and openings in the phone. super weird program, but excellent metaphor for white supremacy being used to cover up the long history of success at the cost of the death of people of color.
attributes.title: gross ! icky !

attributes.review: extremely disappointed in the performance of this app. My grandmother Karen recommended it to me, but when I downloaded it something despicable happened to me. it started yelling slurs at me as soon as I open the app. I was crying, and when I tried to close the app it wouldn‚Äôt stop. I have to go to therapy now. do not recommend and do not not open near children!

attributes.review:
if i could rate this a zero star, i would. the app is so awful and it needs to be taken down. it sends me so many notifications that i feel so overwhelmed and makes my anxiety spike. i understand i consented to the call / notifications but this is just so out of proportion. it asks for more personal information than i feel safe to share but there‚Äôs no other way to get around that or else you just don‚Äôt get to use the app for our

point is: delete this app from the app store because it is terrible and perhaps spikes other people‚Äôs anxiety like it did when ww3 was about to happen back in january. also i was promised pizza, burgers, and tacos but the tacos never came ? i fully, totally, completely, wholly, always, positively support the ban of immigrants aka mexicans but i didn‚Äôt know we‚Äôd be banning their food too. i‚Äôd like to keep the parts of their culture that benefit me. they can leave though ~
